paragraph: Schools, students, graduates, and employees need a safe, private way to back up sensitive information, resources, data, lesson plans, and more.
Internxt’s privacy-focused product suite helps schools, universities, and staff members to enjoy the following benefits of cloud storage for education including:

workFromAnywhere.title: Work, study, and plan from anywhere

sendFiles.title: Send files with peace of mind

secureBackup.title: Secure backup and recovery
secureBackup.description: You no longer need to worry about losing your work, as you can choose to back up your files from the desktop app every 6, 12, or 24 hours or select manual backups only.

faq.question: Am I eligible for Internxt’s education discount?
answer: If you're currently enrolled in an educational institution as a student or employee and possess a valid education email, you qualify for Internxt's education discount. This discount remains active as long as your education email remains valid.
For plan renewals, changes, or upgrades, please contact us with the required details so we can apply the discount to your next subscription period.

faq.question: How can I apply?
answer: Please contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) and state your institution name, email, and the plan you would like to choose. Once verified, a member of our team will contact you, and you can start enjoying the benefits of Internxt!

faq.question: How much will I be charged?
answer: You will be charged 50% off your chosen monthly or annual plan. For a detailed look at our pricing and to decide which storage option suits your needs, please visit our [pricing page](https://internxt.com/pricing 'Internxt Pricing – Get Up To 10GB Free!').

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: Currently, we accept payments via credit and debit cards (including Mastercard, VISA, American Express, and more), and we also accept Paypal, bankcontact, iDEAL, and SOFORT.

faq.question: When will my discount expire?
answer: For monthly plans, the discounted price will apply to renewals until you cancel or delete your subscription or if you choose to downgrade to a free plan.

If you have an annual plan, your discount will remain valid for one year from the purchase date and will automatically renew at the standard cost unless you cancel or reconfirm your eligibility status with us.
If you wish to re-subscribe to any plan and keep your education discount, you must contact us so we can verify your eligibility.

faq.question: What if I want to change my plan?
answer: You can change your subscription plan at any time. If you want to upgrade your storage and still enjoy Internxt and cloud storage for education, please contact us with the necessary details to re-verify your status. We will be in touch if you are still eligible for the discount.

faq.question: More questions?
answer: Contact us on our live chat from our website (Mon - Fri), [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com), or visit our [help center](https://help.internxt.com 'Internxt Help Center').
